game.name: Last Heroes 2
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Find out what is ahead for Amelia and Roland, as they are headed to Odaro continent, in this new entry in the hit RPG series Last Heroes!

reviewHighlights.text: [h2]Last Heroes 2[/h2] Has a total of [b]5[/b] trading cards.
